name: Eggsploding Chickens the game
description: Maybe it was the uranium in the ground or perhaps the lead in the water. But the farmer sanity was long since gone, with shoes nailed to his feet and glass shards for teeth’s hi hade deduce a genius plan. Make chickens lay ammunition, and no pesky government could control him anymore! And somehow in his madness he succeeded, with some explosive side effects. But he also had created a Fenix, a mighty, unstoppable, hay driven, immortal hen! How with explosive bravely decide that enough was enough and challenge the crazy farmer to epic battle that only one of them will leave alive.
